title: 65 Graded, P-Ex, FS/T--See new Lajoie, Evers--
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: 65 Graded, P-Ex, FS/T--See new Lajoie, Evers--
posts.post_content:
Following is a list of the graded cards I have for sale or trade.
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] to see scans.
First to take a card gets it.

General price guides for Piedmont commons, to give you an idea:
 
Authentic, $15-20,
Poor: $15-20,
Fair: $20-25,
Good: $25-30,
VG: $30-40,
 
Add $3 for first-class S/H.  Second card ships free; third card, I'll pay all S/H.  Additional discounts for more items.
Most forms of payment accepted; if paypal, paypal friend [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No messages on paypal, please]; thanks.
